course_detail: An introductory course covering basic concepts of computer science including algorithms, data structures, and programming fundamentals.
A comprehensive course focusing on advanced data structures and algorithms commonly used in software development.
Learn the basics of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and build your first websites.
Explore the principles and practices of designing and managing databases, SQL, and relational database systems.
An introduction to machine learning concepts, algorithms, and applications, with hands-on exercises.
Learn the fundamentals of cybersecurity, including network security, cryptography, and ethical hacking techniques.
Understand the principles of software engineering, including software development methodologies, testing, and project management.
Explore advanced topics in artificial intelligence, including neural networks, deep learning, and natural language processing.
Learn about cloud computing concepts, platforms, and services, and how to deploy and manage applications in the cloud.
